title: Big Bill Doyle
description: John Wayne’s final movie, with commentary courtesy of Turner Classic Movies. The director finally reveals why he had to work around the outhouse (Wayne had beef and coffee for every meal).
quote: Big Bill Doyle!” “That’s right. And I just made a Big Bill coil.
altHero: a cowboy reluctantly talks to a closed outhouse
alt1: cowboys on horses run toward a building
alt2: two outlaws on horses shoot guns in the air as people flee
alt3: the outlaws are surprised by a horse carrying an outhouse
alt4: the outlaws surrender as the horse collapses under the weight of the outhouse, now open to reveal Big Bill Doyle sitting inside
